game.title: Slayer of the Dragon
game.description: The once peaceful village of Dragon's Rest has been terrorized by a fearsome dragon. Slay the beast and restore peace to the village.

task.description: Speak to the villagers of Dragon's Rest to gather information about the Dragon's lair and its habits.
Obtain a rare metal called Draconium and bring it to the village blacksmith to forge a weapon capable of slaying the Dragon.
Locate the Dragon's lair and confront the beast. Defeat the Dragon and bring its head as proof of your victory.
Return to the Mayor of Dragon's Rest with the Dragon's head to claim your reward.
